parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition. From epi and tithemi; to impose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
